# mediaItems

**Instance Property**

The media content to add.

## Declaration

```swift
var mediaItems: [INMediaItem]? { get }
```

## Discussion

A media item such as a song, audiobook, or podcast episode. Although the array can contain more than one [doc://com.apple.sirikit/documentation/Intents/INMediaItem] object, the system uses only the first item in the array. You set [doc://com.apple.sirikit/documentation/Intents/INPlayMediaIntent/mediaItems] when creating the [doc://com.apple.sirikit/documentation/Intents/INAddMediaIntent] object.

## Accessing the Media

- **mediaSearch**: The location to search for the media item to add.
- **mediaDestination**: The location for the media to add.
- **INMediaDestination**: An object that describes the destination for a media item.
- **INMediaDestinationReference**: An object that describes the destination for a media item.
